title: Marcus Morris Sr. - New York Knicks Forward - ESPN
snippet: View the profile of New York Knicks Forward Marcus Morris Sr. on ESPN. Get the latest news, live stats and game highlights.

title: Marcus Morris Sr., Knicks Agree to Contract in NBA Free Agency; Updated Depth Chart
snippet: The New York Knicks have added some depth in free agency as the 2024-25 NBA season nears. The team announced Sunday that it had signed veteran forward Marcus Morris Sr.

title: Knicks Waive Marcus Morris Sr., Chuma Okeke amid Rumored Karl-Anthony Towns Trade
snippet: The Knicks added Morris just over a month later, signing him to an Exhibit 9 deal. The contract essentially served as a training camp invite, as sharpshooter Landry Shamet also received one on the same day.

title: Marcus Morris Sr. | New York Knicks | NBA.com
snippet: Morris will join the Knicks on a one-year deal, Shams Charania of The Athletic reports.

title: Marcus Morris Sr. - Wikipedia
snippet: On July 16, 2019, Morris signed with the New York Knicks.
